properties.displayName: A client made a web request to a potentially harmful file (ASIM Web Session schema)
properties.description:
This rule identifies a web request to a URL that holds a file type, including .ps1, .bat, .vbs, and .scr that can be harmful if downloaded. This rule uses the [Advanced SIEM Information Model (ASIM)](https://aka.ms/AboutASIM) and supports any web session source that complies with ASIM. To use this Analytics Rule, deploy the Advanced SIEM information Model (ASIM).
To use this analytics rule, deploy the [Advanced SIEM information Model (ASIM)](https://aka.ms/DeployASIM)
